import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update room available times"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v2.0/locations/rooms/{locationRoomId}/available-times"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates the weekly availability schedule for a room. Use this to set open/closed hours or to adjust booking windows.

**Prerequisites**
1. **locationRoomId** - Use [POST /api/v2.0/locations/rooms/query](/docs/api/locations/query-location-rooms) and extract `Items[].LocationRoomId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. Build an array of `UpdateLocationRoomAvailableTimeRequest` entries.
2. Submit: [POST /api/v2.0/locations/rooms/\{locationRoomId\}/available-times](/docs/api/locations/update-location-room-available-times).
3. Re-fetch the schedule to confirm updates.

**Minimal Required Fields**: locationRoomId (path) and an availability array in the body.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"locationRoomId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"The unique identifier of the room"},{"name":"Authorization","in":"header","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"Bearer token for authentication"},{"name":"SiteId","in":"header","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"Site context for the request"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","description":"Request model for creating or updating room availability times. Extends LocationRoomAvailableTime.","properties":{"LocationRoomAvailableTimeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Unique identifier for this availability record. Null for new records."},"LocationRoomId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Reference to the parent room"},"Weekday":{"type":"integer","minimum":0,"maximum":6,"description":"Day of the week (0=Sunday, 1=Monday, ..., 6=Saturday)"},"IsClosed":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether the room is closed/unavailable on this day"},"LocalStartTime":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Start time of availability window in local time (HH:mm:ss format)","example":"08:00:00"},"LocalEndTime":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"End time of availability window in local time (HH:mm:ss format)","example":"17:00:00"},"IsDeleted":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether this availability record should be deleted"}},"title":"UpdateLocationRoomAvailableTimeRequest"}},"example":[{"Weekday":1,"IsClosed":false,"LocalStartTime":"08:00:00","LocalEndTime":"17:00:00"},{"Weekday":0,"IsClosed":true}]}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
